verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Namaskarimpa randi daveedu putruni Sriyesu rakshakundu yetenche nelanu Nyayambu lokamandu stapinchi nityamu Anyaaya manthadaanu pogotta vachenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Varshambu padunattu shuskinchu nelanu Dukinchu vaarikella harsambu nichunu Sri yesu rajyamandu sadbaktulandaru Karjura vrukshareetin vardhillu chunduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}digantavasulaina bhurajulandaru Sri yesu charanambul namaskarinturu Bhooloka vasulaina janambhulandaru Kriste swadinamandu jeevinthureppudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Virodulaina varin jayimpa nennadun Simhasanmbu meeda naaseenundagunu Atyanta premamurthi sriyesu prabhuvu Aa divya kirthi vyapinchu nee bhuvin{/lang-eng}
